00012 int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
00013         ColorSegment segment;
00014         Mat image;
00015 
00016 
00017         CvCapture * video;
00018         IplImage * frame;
00019 
00020         // capture the camera
00021         video = cvCreateCameraCapture(1);
00022 
00023         namedWindow("window");
00024 
00025     while (true) {
00026         frame = cvQueryFrame(video);
00027         if(!frame) {
00028                         printf("error loading frame.\n");
00029                         return -1;
00030         }
00031 
00032         Mat src(frame);
00033 
00034         image = segment.TestThreshold(src);
00035         image = segment.detectLines(image);
00036 
00037         imshow("window", image);
00038 
00039                 // press 'esc' to exit out of program
00040                 char c = waitKey(33);
00041                 if(c == 27) break;
00042 
00043     }
00044 
00045     return 0;

00073 Mat ColorSegment::detectLines(Mat & src){
00074         Mat color_dst;
00075 
00076     //Canny( src, dst, 50, 200, 3 );
00077 
00078         cvtColor( src, color_dst, CV_GRAY2BGR );
00079 
00080     vector<Vec4i> lines;
00081     HoughLinesP( src, lines, 1, CV_PI/180, 80, 30, 10 );
00082     for( size_t i = 0; i < lines.size(); i++ )
00083     {
00084         line( color_dst, Point(lines[i][0], lines[i][1]),
00085             Point(lines[i][2], lines[i][3]), Scalar(0,0,255), 3, 8 );
00086     }
00087 
00088     /*
00089     namedWindow( "Source", 1 );
00090     imshow( "Source", src );
00091 
00092     namedWindow( "Detected Lines", 1 );
00093     imshow( "Detected Lines", color_dst );
00094 
00095     waitKey(0);
00096     */
00097     return color_dst;
00098 }

00104 void ColorSegment::TestRGB(string imageName){
00105         Mat image = imread(imageName);
00106 
00107 
00108         namedWindow("image");
00109         namedWindow("red");
00110         namedWindow("green?");
00111         namedWindow("blue?");
00112 
00113         vector<Mat> channels(image.channels());
00114         split(image, channels);
00115 
00116         threshold(channels[0], channels[0], 50, 255, THRESH_BINARY);
00117         threshold(channels[1], channels[1], 50, 255, THRESH_BINARY);
00118         threshold(channels[2], channels[2], 100, 255, THRESH_BINARY);
00119 
00120         imshow("image", image);
00121         imshow("blue?", channels[0]);
00122         imshow("green?", channels[1]);
00123         imshow("red", channels[2]);
00124 
00125         waitKey(0);
00126 
00127 
00128 }

00152 Mat ColorSegment::TestThreshold(string imageName){

00155         //Mat white;
00156         //Mat newWhite;
00157         //Mat bright;

00164 
00165         //namedWindow("white");
00166         //namedWindow("bright");
00167         //namedWindow("yellow");
00168

00170         orange = getOrange(channels[1]);
00171

00173

00180         //imshow("yellow", yellow);
00181 
00182         //waitKey(0);
00183 
00184         return orange;

00188 Mat ColorSegment::TestThreshold(Mat & image){
00189         Mat orange;
00190         vector<Mat> channels = RGBtoHSV(image);
00191         orange = getOrange(channels[1]);
00192 
00193         return orange;

00230 Mat ColorSegment::getWhite(Mat & image){
00231         Mat whiteImage;
00232 
00234         threshold(image, whiteImage, 10, 255, THRESH_BINARY);
00235 
00236         //erode(whiteImage, whiteImage, Mat(), Point(-1, -1), 1);
00237         //dilate(whiteImage, whiteImage, Mat(), Point(-1, -1), 1);
00238 
00239         return whiteImage;
00240 }
00241 
00242 Mat ColorSegment::getOrange(Mat & image){
00243         Mat orangeImage;
00244 
00246         threshold(image, orangeImage, 150, 255, THRESH_BINARY);
00247 
00248         erode(orangeImage, orangeImage, Mat(), Point(-1, -1), 1);
00249         dilate(orangeImage, orangeImage, Mat(), Point(-1, -1), 1);
00250 
00251         return orangeImage;
00252         //return image;
00253 }

00255 /*
00256  * vector[0] - hue
00257  * vector[1] - saturation
00258  * vector[2] - value
00259  */
00260 vector<Mat> ColorSegment::RGBtoHSV(Mat & image){
00261         Mat temp = image.clone();
00262         cvtColor(temp, temp, CV_RGB2HSV);
00263 
00264         // split multi-channel picture into single-channels
00265         vector<Mat> vect(image.channels());
00266         split(temp, vect);
00267 
00268         return vect;
00269 }
00270 
00271 /*
00272  * vector[0] - ?
00273  * vector[1] - ?
00274  * vector[2] - ?
00275  */
00276 vector<Mat> ColorSegment::RGBtoYCrCb(Mat & image){
00277         Mat temp = image.clone();
00278         cvtColor(temp, temp, CV_RGB2YCrCb);
00279 
00280         // split multi-channel picture into single-channels
00281         vector<Mat> vect(image.channels());
00282         split(temp, vect);
00283 
00284         return vect;
00285 }

00288 void ColorSegment::saveRGBtoHSV(string imageName){
00289 
00290         Mat image = imread(imageName);
00291         imageName = imageName.substr(0, imageName.size() - 4);
00292 
00293         namedWindow("image");
00294         //namedWindow("converted");
00295         namedWindow("hue");
00296         namedWindow("saturation");
00297         namedWindow("value");
00298 
00299         imshow("image", image);
00300 
00301         // converted from RGB to HSV
00302         cvtColor(image, image, CV_RGB2HSV);
00303 
00304         //imshow("converted", image);
00305 
00306         // split multi-channel picture into single-channels
00307         vector<Mat> test(3);
00308         split(image, test);
00309 
00310         imshow("hue", test[0]);
00311         imwrite(imageName + "hue.jpg", test[0]);
00312 
00313         imshow("saturation", test[1]);
00314         imwrite(imageName + "saturation.jpg", test[1]);
00315 
00316         imshow("value", test[2]);
00317         imwrite(imageName + "value.jpg", test[2]);
00318 
00319         waitKey(0);
00320 
00321 }
00322 
00323 void ColorSegment::saveImages() {
00324 
00325         CvCapture * video;
00326         IplImage * frame;
00327         int imageCounter = 0;
00328 
00329         // capture the camera
00330     video = cvCreateCameraCapture(1);
00331 
00332     if (!video) {
00333         printf("Unable to open camera");
00334         return;
00335     }
00336 
00337     // create an empty window
00338     cvNamedWindow("window", CV_WINDOW_AUTOSIZE);
00339 
00340     // grab a frame from the video feed
00341     frame = cvQueryFrame(video);
00342 
00343     while (true) {
00344         // show image in window
00345         cvShowImage("window", frame);
00346 
00347         // get new image from video feed
00348         frame = cvQueryFrame(video);
00349 
00350         // check to see if it is a good image
00351                 if(!frame) {
00352                         printf("error loading frame.\n");
00353                         return;
00354                 }
00355 
00356                 // press 'esc' to exit out of program
00357                 char c = waitKey(33);
00358                 if(c == 27) break;
00359                 if(c == 's'){
00360                         imageCounter++;
00361                         // Save image
00362                         stringstream stream;
00363                         stream << imageCounter;
00364                         string temp = "image" + stream.str() + ".jpg";
00365                         //string temp = "image2.jpg";
00366                         cvSaveImage(temp.c_str() , frame);
00367                 }
00368     }
00369 
00370 }
